description: Van Hohenheim is a brilliant and well-known alchemist. He is the father of http://anidb.net/ch5885 [Edward] and http://anidb.net/ch5908 [Alphonse] Elric. He left them and their mother http://anidb.net/ch7784 [Trisha] when Alphonse was a baby and Edward was very young. Years later, Edward still holds a grudge against him for abandoning his mother, which he believes contributed to her death.
name: Van Hohenheim
